Reviews.Title: “A Very Good basic hotel offering value for money”
Reviews.Author: Gourmond77
Reviews.Content: liked belgrave brilliant location yards oval tube staff helpful friendly leave breakfast sorted basic finished clean etc car park secure

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location, clean and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: shadi63
Reviews.Content: stayed week christmas break reserved bathroom clean beds comfortable showers breaksfast served morning continental serve eggs requested hotel located minute walk oval tube station convenient pubs restaurants short five ten minute walk flat screen tvs sky lots channels including sports front desk staff friendly helpful free wifi reception

Reviews.Content: pleasantly suprised overall excellent night stay clean warm freindly service welcomingthe massive reasonable 1 2 clean warm interior feelings hotel staff helpfull didnt wait front door hours day 2012 parking hotel bit exceptable convienent concidering time else possibly cost time showers lovely water coming floor hotel wich pain especially dressed soaks wet goin bathroom spruce youre self occassions ready youre night beds comfy lots spring pleasnat nights beds bit solid central heating immediately hotel bedroom window bit chill soon heated middle night warm winters night pleasing awoke realised breakfast served untill 1030am didnt depart untill 1130am day late night car return journey home hotel manager spoken enjoyed stay breakfast wich bit late night kindly escorted clean dining seated ok breakfast coffee tea squeezed orange juice cereals fruit delighted soon sat tasty fry etc coffe tea orange juice star stay none short customer servive warm clean helpfull polite staff wich books comfort nice chilling time

Reviews.Title: “Nice & simple for the weekend”
Reviews.Author: welsk123
Reviews.Content: stayed nye crash night brixton academy close brixton literally 2 minute walk oval tube station outside looks bit shabby inside clean safe theres bed toilet shower thats night definitely return reasonable price london especially nye hotel bar

Reviews.Title: “very nice”
Reviews.Author: meguin81
Reviews.Content: stay hotel comfortable traffic noticeable safe literally couple minutes walk tube easy walk centre london staff friendly continental brekky included pirce

Reviews.Title: “please tidy front garden”
Reviews.Author: caraCorsham
Reviews.Content: space front hotel untidy husband doubtful shame inside immaculately clean 2 staff quality linen expensive boutique style hotel bit shame worst review faulty towers refer hotel victoria suited people stay look bad outside reviwers breakfast true

Reviews.Title: “great value for money”
Reviews.Author: newsreeder
Reviews.Content: five stayed night london brighton bike ride hotel 15minute cycle ride clapham common staff helpful helped bikes secure storage including tandem hand 5am fix breakfast linen clean showers easy access tube bus centre london oval tube road am easily pleased hotel ideal

Reviews.Title: “Oh dear!”

Reviews.Content: stayed january partner holiday thailand decided 2 days london called hotel spirits welcomed receptionist started walk stairs tell looking corridors fun time door dropped looked foldup double bed dated kitchen hearts sunk matress bed thick feel spring moved bed creek night sheets dirty yellow stains brown wool blanket covered clumps hair bathroom shower cubicle corner fridge freezer public toilet corridor wasnt fixed wall sayed 2 nights night kept night scratching vermin walls swear trying bin horrible breakfast basic consisted cornflakes orange juice tea coffee toast scruffy looking polish girl speak word english toast morning smile customer service yes 70 night expect little spent time town posible hotel depressing stay paid luckily holiday thailand perfect
